A4.text: Warner Bros. completed its purchase of Leavesden Studios and announced plans to invest more than Â£100 million into the site they had occupied for over ten years, rebranding it Warner Bros. Studios Leavesden.

A5.text: Every one of the Harry Potter films was based at Leavesden Studios over the following ten years.
